“ aah enawala math ekak yanna “ dimawayi anith porawayi mis ekkagena giya.passe denna aawata passe wisthare ahagaththa.dima lassanata siddhiya una hati wisthara karanawa.mis uganwana wele dunna hamba unahama dimata samanyayen adena gana madi wage unalu.passe eha putuwe hitapu porata allaganna kiyala tikak thadata adala.ee adapu para ehemmalu passe pettiyatama dala mista dila.misuth balannathuwa lab ekata dila.passe fisiks mista lab eken sadde dala dunna adala heminma genath dunna kiyala.mista ara widihata mala panapu ekata puduma wenna deyak nane.

pradeshaye gowin siyayata siyayak enam, thama akkara dekahamarama me wana wita wapura athi namuth, ihatha sandahan jala lekam karyalayen diyawara sapayanuye, ek ek pradeshayata dina dekak pamanak wana athara, akkara dekahamara sandahama jalaya sapayimata ee anuwa gowinta labena kalaya wanuye.

(a) jathyanthara manawa himikam sammathayan ha pramithinta anukula wima sahathika kirima sandaha samakami raswime nidahasata adala nithi ha regulasi sanshodhanaya kirima salaka balanna; (aa) sanwidhayakayinta saha nithiya balathmaka kirime baladharinta nithiyata anuwa raswim sanwidhanaya kirima pahasu kirima sandaha samakami ekraswime nidahasa pilibanda nithi saha regulasi matha padanamwu pahadili ha wiwrutha manga penwim wardhanaya kirima salaka balanna; eja wishesha niyojitha klemo wule (a) saparadhi awadanamakin thorawa swayansiddha ho hadisi raswim pawathwimata ida dima sandaha danum dime kriya patipati sambandhayen nithiya sanshodhanaya kirima salaka balanna; (aa)) samakami ekraswime nidahasa sandaha athi ayithiya nithyanukulawa kriyathmaka karana wirodhathakaruwan aparadhakaruwanbawata pathkarena thrasthawadaya walakwime panatha athulu jathika aarakshaka nithi bhawitha kirimen walakinna; (i) antharjathika manawa himikam pramithinta samawitama patahani piyawarak wana, sampurnayen ho ardha washayen antharjalaya wasa damimen walakinna; anthar jalayehi pala karena prachandakari anthargathayan saha wyaja thorathuru sambandhayen paladayi ha sakshimatha piyawara ganima sandaha siwil samajaya, madhya, antharjala sewa sapayannan saha samaja madhya samagam samanga sahayogayen wada karanna.

eksath jathika pakshaya saha sha්ri lanka nidahas pakshaya pa්radhana dhura deka darana, wipaksha nayaka dhuraya demala janathawage nayakayeku darana, demala janathawa niyojanaya karana paksha – demala jathika sandhanaya, daglas dewananda mathithumage eepingipi sanwidhanaya kiyana degolloma – mema aanduka්rama wyawastha ka්riyawaliyata sambandha wela sitina mema awasthawa aththa washayenma swarnamaya awasthawak.
